field.name: inTaxTotal
field.viewer:
<dl class="dl-horizontal"> <dt x-translate>Total W.T..........{{record.netCgst}}</dt> <dd>{{record.exTaxTotal}} {{record.currency.symbol}} </dd> <dt x-translate>Net CGST</dt> <dd>{{record.netCgst}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt x-translate>Net SGST</dt> <dd>{{record.netSgst}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt x-translate>Net IGST</dt> <dd>{{record.netIgst}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt x-translate>Non GST Taxes</dt> <dd>{{record.taxTotal - record.netIgst-record.netCgst-record.netSgst}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt x-translate>Total tax</dt> <dd>{{record.taxTotal}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt class="order-subtotal-total" x-translate>Total A.T.I.</dt> <dd class="order-subtotal-total">{{record.inTaxTotal}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt ng-show="record.statusSelect >= 3" x-translate>Amount invoiced W.T.</dt> <dd ng-show="record.statusSelect >= 3">{{record.amountInvoiced}} {{record.currency.symbol}}</dd> <dt ng-show="record.statusSelect >= 2" x-translate>Advance payment total</dt> <dd ng-show="record.statusSelect >= 2">{{record.advanceTotal}} {{record.currency.symbol}} Working</dd>
</dl> Cgst: {{record.netCgst}}
